body.p: Samuel Rise States that he lives near 2 miles from where Margolyes Kept Tavern and at the time lived in Bennetsville I am well acquainted with the said Margolyes, was there several times. and know that he was prepared to entertain all who might call on him genteely. I further State that the said Margolyeys spoke to me in case he was not able to take care of all horses that might come to bo he might have my slave, I let him know he might it I recollect to have Seen corn at the said Margolyes. I know of said Margolyes selling flour & corn and also Carrying,
Given under my hand this 21st Nov 1861
Sworn to before me this 21st November 1861
Edward Pate J P B C
